metadata.description: Sets the domain name prefix for the web app. The concatenation of the domain name and the regionalized DNS zone make up the full A record of the web app.
Sets the hosting plan name prefix for the web app. The concatenation of the service plan name and the region make up the full name of the plan.
Set the hosting type for the web app service plan. Accepted values are Standard and Premium.
Set the performance level of the service plan. Accepts values 0, 1 or 2.
The number of web instances for the service plan. This value can be from 1 to 10.
Enter a name used by the web app for Application Insights.
Enter a globally-unique name for the storage account. Must be between 3 and 24 characters long.
